text: The AVN Award for Best Actress is an award that has been given by sex industry company AVN since the award ceremony's inception in 1984. As of January 2023, the titleholder is Maitland Ward. ==Winners and nominees== ===1984–1989=== Year Photo Winner Nominees 1984 Sharon Mitchell 1985 Pamela Mann 1986 Sheri St. Claire 1986 Ginger Lynn
